verses.verse: That which <WH834> came <WH1961> as the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> to Jeremiah <WH3414> in regard <WH1697> to the drought: <WH9060>
"Judah <WH3063> mourns, <WH56> And her gates <WH8179> languish; <WH535> They sit <WH6937> on the ground <WH776> in mourning, <WH6937> And the cry <WH6682> of Jerusalem <WH3389> has ascended. <WH5927>

"And their nobles <WH117> have sent <WH7971> their servants <WH6810> for water; <WH4325> They have come <WH935> to the cisterns <WH1356> and found <WH4672> no <WH3808> water. <WH4325> They have returned <WH7725> with their vessels <WH3627> empty; <WH7387> They have been <WH954> put <WH954> to shame <WH954> and humiliated, <WH3637> And they cover <WH2645> their heads. <WH7218>

"Because <WH5668> the ground <WH127> is cracked, <WH2865> For there has been <WH1961> no <WH3808> rain <WH1653> on the land; <WH776> The farmers <WH406> have been <WH954> put <WH954> to shame, <WH954> They have covered <WH2645> their heads. <WH7218>
"For even <WH1571> the doe <WH355> in the field <WH7704> has given <WH3205> birth <WH3205> only to abandon <WH5800> [her young,] Because <WH3588> there is no <WH3808> grass. <WH1877>

"And the wild <WH6501> donkeys <WH6501> stand <WH5975> on the bare <WH8205> heights; <WH8205> They pant <WH7602> for air <WH7307> like jackals, <WH8565> Their eyes <WH5869> fail <WH3615> For there <WH369> is no <WH369> vegetation. <WH6212>

"Although <WH518> our iniquities <WH5771> testify <WH6030> against us, O Lord, <WH3068> act <WH6213> for Thy name's sake! <WH4616> Truly <WH3588> our apostasies <WH4878> have been <WH7231> many, <WH7231> We have sinned <WH2398> against Thee.

"Thou Hope <WH4723> of Israel, <WH3478> Its Savior <WH3467> in time <WH6256> of distress, <WH6869> Why <WH4100> art <WH1961> Thou like a stranger <WH1616> in the land <WH776> Or like a traveler <WH732> who has pitched <WH5186> his [tent] for the night <WH3885>?

"Why <WH4100> art <WH1961> Thou like a man <WH376> dismayed, <WH1724> Like a mighty <WH1368> man <WH1368> who cannot <WH3201> <WH3808> save <WH3467>? Yet Thou art in our midst, <WH7130> O Lord, <WH3068> And we are called <WH7121> by Thy name; <WH8034> Do not forsake <WH5117> us!"

Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> to this <WH2088> people, <WH5971> "Even so <WH3651> they have loved <WH157> to wander; <WH5128> they have not kept <WH2820> their feet <WH7272> in check. <WH2820> Therefore the Lord <WH3068> does not accept <WH7521> them; now <WH6258> He will remember <WH2142> their iniquity <WH5771> and call <WH6485> their sins <WH9128> to account. <WH6485>"
So the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, "Do not pray <WH6419> for the welfare <WH9186> of this <WH2088> people. <WH5971>

"When <WH3588> they fast, <WH6684> I am not going to listen <WH8085> to their cry; <WH7440> and when <WH3588> they offer <WH5927> burnt <WH5930> offering <WH5930> and grain offering, <WH4503> I am not going to accept <WH7521> them. Rather <WH3588> I am going to make <WH3615> an end <WH3615> of them by the sword, <WH2719> famine <WH7458> and pestilence. <WH1698>"

But, "Ah, Lord <WH136> God! <WH3068>" I said, <WH559> "Look, <WH2009> the prophets <WH5030> are telling <WH559> them, 'You will not see <WH7200> the sword <WH2719> nor <WH3808> will you have <WH1961> famine, <WH7458> but I will give <WH5414> you lasting <WH571> peace <WH7965> in this <WH2088> place. <WH4725>'"

Then the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, "The prophets <WH5030> are prophesying <WH5012> falsehood <WH8267> in My name. <WH8034> I have neither <WH3808> sent <WH7971> them nor <WH3808> commanded <WH6680> them nor <WH3808> spoken <WH1696> to them; they are prophesying <WH5012> to you a false <WH8267> vision, <WH2377> divination, <WH7081> futility <WH457> and the deception <WH9652> of their own minds. <WH3820>

"Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> concerning <WH5921> the prophets <WH5030> who are prophesying <WH5012> in My name, <WH8034> although it was not I who sent <WH7971> them – yet they keep saying, <WH559> 'There shall be no <WH3808> sword <WH2719> or famine <WH7458> in this <WH384> land <WH776>' – by sword <WH2719> and famine <WH7458> those <WH1992> prophets <WH5030> shall meet <WH8552> their end! <WH8552>

"The people <WH5971> also to whom <WH834> they are prophesying <WH5012> will be thrown <WH7993> out into the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of the famine <WH7458> and the sword; <WH2719> and there <WH369> will be no <WH369> one <WH369> to bury <WH6912> them – [neither] them, [nor <WH369>] their wives, <WH802> nor <WH369> their sons, <WH1121> nor their daughters <WH1323> – for I shall pour <WH8210> out their [own] wickedness <WH9567> on them.

"And you will say <WH559> this <WH2088> word <WH1697> to them, 'Let my eyes <WH5869> flow <WH3381> down <WH3381> with tears <WH1832> night <WH3915> and day, <WH3119> And let them not cease; <WH1820> For the virgin <WH1330> daughter <WH1323> of my people <WH5971> has been crushed <WH7665> with a mighty <WH1419> blow, <WH4347> With a sorely <WH3966> infected <WH2470> wound. <WH4347>

'If <WH518> I go <WH3318> out to the country, <WH7704> Behold, <WH2009> those slain <WH2491> with the sword! <WH2719> Or if <WH518> I enter <WH935> the city, <WH5892> Behold, <WH2009> diseases <WH8463> of famine! <WH7458> For both <WH1571> prophet <WH5030> and priest <WH3548> Have gone roving <WH5503> about <WH5503> in the land <WH776> that they do not know. <WH3045>' "

Hast Thou completely <WH3988> rejected <WH3988> Judah <WH3063>? Or <WH518> hast Thou loathed <WH1602> Zion <WH6726>? Why <WH4069> hast Thou stricken <WH5221> us so that we are beyond <WH369> healing <WH4832>? [We] waited <WH6960> for peace, <WH7965> but nothing <WH369> good <WH9185> [came;] And for a time <WH6256> of healing, <WH4832> but behold, <WH2009> terror! <WH1205>
We know <WH3045> our wickedness, <WH7562> O Lord, <WH3068> The iniquity <WH5771> of our fathers, for we have sinned <WH1> against Thee.

Do not despise <WH5006> [us,] for Thine own name's sake; <WH4616> Do not disgrace <WH9310> the throne <WH3678> of Thy glory; <WH9202> Remember <WH2142> [and] do not annul <WH6565> Thy covenant <WH1285> with us.

Are there <WH3426> any <WH3426> among the idols <WH1892> of the nations <WH1471> who give <WH1652> rain <WH1652>? Or <WH518> can the heavens <WH8064> grant <WH5414> showers <WH7241>? Is it not Thou, O Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>? Therefore we hope <WH6960> in Thee, For Thou art the one who hast done <WH6213> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things. <WH428>
